slug.description: A human friendly string used in the opt-in URL

name.description: The opt-in you would like to get consent for

description.description: A statement or tag line describing the opt-in

acceptance_count.description: The number of times the opt-in has been accepted

release_ids.description: An array of IDs representing the releases that are associated with the opt-in

created_at.description: The date this opt-in was created

updated_at.description: The date this opt-in was last updated
